opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States

opinion:
127 S.Ct. 1357 (2007)

David J. SITOMER, et al., petitioners,
v.
Rufus G. KING, III, Chief Judge, Superior Court of the District of Columbia, et al.

No. 06-833.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 20, 2007.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
